title: View am Adjmer and lake amazing!
review: Just stopped here on my way to Pushkar. Struggled to take photos EVERYONE wanted to take photos OF ME!  HAD to laugh it was go

title: Awesome view of the city from this point at night
review: This newly constructed monument is not only famous for Indian warrior- Prithviraj, but also a site for taking panormic view of Ajmer city from a height. It's better to go in evening time, when you can see a lighted Ajmer. It's located at Pushkar road.

title: Visit to Prithviraj Smarak Monument
review: Wow...built on a hill you can get 360degree view of Ajmer and in the night that looks amazing. Loved it

title: The Brave Maharaja Prithvi Raj Chauhan Monumnet
review: The monument is at great location while going to pushkar , you can take a panoramic view of Ajmer from there.

title: Monument of valour
review: Perched half way atop the motorable road to taragarh hill, this place offers a breathtaking view of the city of Ajmer. There stands tall the statute of erstwhile Hindu Emperor, Prithviraj Chouhan who abducted his beloved from the heavily guarded intendwd marriage function of Sanyogita, the beautiful daughter of the ruler of Kannauj. His tales of love and valour are well known...

title: Place with a Great View
review: This memorial is located between Ajmer and Pushkar. Very good place to spend some time with a great view overlooking the Ajmer city and huge Ana Sagar lake. Good place for selfies and snaps. Although the aminities there like restaurant and public toilet seemed to be non-operational. A must visit spot to spend some time if you are travelling between Ajmer and Pushkar.

title: Recent addition
review: Just a commemorative monument to resurrect the memory of Prithviraj Chauhan with an eye on popular votes. Just a statue and a park on a hill. Visit for a view of the city, because there is nothing else on offer

title: Beautiful Monument forming a Landmark
review: The Monument is dedicate to the great warrior king of Rajasthan. It is located on the Lake and surroundings are nicely developed. The place becomes a picnic spot for the visitors.

title: Beauty
review: Well this place is on top of the city, the whole city can be seen from here. I heard that they run a light show too in evening showcasing the ruler stories but I may be next time I shall witness the same

title: A Beautiful Landmark
review: Between the holy town of Pushkar and Ajmer, this landmark is famous for the view of Ajmer that it allows. This is a perfect place for a beautiful view of the Anasagar Lake and half of Ajmer city. It is like a big lawn with chairs and beautiful seating arrangement where one may spend half an hour's time during the evenings.

title: Historical place
review: Prithviraj smarak monument is good historical monument. This monument is built by black stone .it looks nice.

title: Historical
review: Prithviraj Smarak monument is wonderful construct. Prithviraj is Hindu Rajput king of Rajasthan. Good one.

title: Simple Monument
review: While going to pushkar from Ajmer by road one encounters this monument on the way.  It is simple monument, with big statue on hill.

title: A short stop via Pushkar
review: Nice place if u want to have a stroll. Best part is to climb the small hill in the car park area. May be in the park u can ve a view of the town, otherwise nothing much

title: Excellent views
review: Conventional monument. The local ruler (and in combination Haryana and Delhi ruler) in ancient times, on a horse with a bow at the ready in his hands. Nothing special. Just, apparently, Ajmer people thus emphasize that there were times when their city was one of the main administrative and political centers of India. Some semblance of the park around (or rather, from the side of the ledge) is also not impressive. However, from here there are superb views of the trough near Aravali mountain ridge and of Ajmer spreaded out in it. Close to Taragarh Fort and  Foy Sagar lake.

title: Prithviraj Samarak
review: Its midway between the Sai Temple and Taragarh. If you are headed for Taragarh, stop and spend some time here. in fact, do not bother to go to Taragarh because it is a waste of time.

title: Nice place
review: Good place for an afternoon picnic or winter evening stroll with great views of the city of Ajmer. Would be fantastic if the descriptions were in english as well.

title: Great...
review: It is Great feeling to see statue of Prithviraj. It is situated on a hill so great to see beautiful city. We take some rest here and again started our journey.

title: Upcoming tourist spot
review: While coming back from Puskar in the evening one can enjoy twinkling lights of Ajmer, the day I visited the regular show was interrupted, so better next time

title: For An amazing view of Ajmer
review: you can visit this place to have amazing view of Ajmer, full of greens ,well maintain. Good place to spend with your family and friends.

title: A bit ill maintained, but nice place
review: Nice place, recently built, but not very well maintained. Tough to visit on hot days, but on cooler timings, gives a great view of the city.

title: Super view of the city!
review: We went there in the evening and what a view it has of the city..situated on top of a hill, it overlooks the entire city..and the new statue adds more grandeur...

title: A big salute to maharaja pritthiraj chauhan
review: We went there in the evening. So we got an  excellent night view of the whole city of ajmer from the hill top,where this park is situated. The statue of King pritthiraj chauhan of eleventh century is there at the centre of that beautiful park.we only came to know about the light and sound show is also there when it get started. It is a mesmerising show. Nobody should miss it in ajmer. Wonderful depiction of the history,

title: Best Monument
review: one of the best monument of Samrat Pruthviraj all detailed history of him hear good garden Rs.10 Entry if you visit this monument..but must go

title: Prithviraj Smarak Monument-Ajmer
review: This smarak in beneath Nag feni Forest and Anna Sagar lake is easily visible from this Place,well maintained and easily accessible no entry fee at present

title: Prithviraj smarak monument... It's amazing look..
review: Located in Ajmer on the way to pushkar located the prithviraj smarak monument. People stop at this location have some clicks and enjoy. It's inenofnyhe greatest views one can have in Ajmer..so don't miss it.

title: A historical monument of hindu king
review: A beautiful statue of king om the way from pushkar to ajmer on hill top. A nice view of whole old city of ajmer.

title: Good view of city
review: if you are going to pushkar . this will fall in the way.... otherwise you can skip the place if paucity of time is there.

title: Maharana Pratap Smarak- King on the Hills
review: Very scenic place, it’s actually a stopover point where you can just sit and relax to watch whole of the Amjer from the Hill top

title: A LOVELY MEMORIAL GOING TO RUIN
review: My wife and I had visited this memorial during our trip to Ajmer in Mar this year. Our aim was to see beat sites and locations which are not full of tourists. This Memorial was recommended to us, and believe me it was well worth the visit. Unfortunately the memorial is going to ruin. Set up by the previous BJP Central Govt, the memorial has not been given its due and thus has begun to crumble.

title: a pick-nick spot above the city
review: On the way to Taragarh a sign directs to a gate with a tiny window where to pay a very small amount as entrance fee (with receipt). A rather serpentine walkway leads past name tagged trees and plants and small stalls depicting history of the region, a tiny temple and a variety of jungle-gyms, slides and see-saws making it an ideal pick-nick spot for families, to the tip of the path - a black marble with a horseman on top. The script on the marble tells about his courage and valuable deeds. Walk around it and find the way downwards along a waterfall like structure depicting the map of the region that was the empire defended by Prithviraj.

title: Memorial to Prithviraj Chauhan
review: The Prithviraj Smarak is a memorial to Prithviraj Chauhan, the great hero of the Rajput Chauhan dynasty. Located on the Taragarh Road in Ajmer, the memorial has a statue of the king in black stone, mounted on a horse.

title: not worth
review: We got there by our byk. We were too exited to see that place but because of no proper maintainance this place has become bad place. I got there but i dint found anything surprizing and good.

title: Amazing architecture
review: This is one of the beautiful architecture present in the city of ajmer.The view at night is amazing and relaxing.

title: Black stone - Horse
review: The Prithviraj Smarak is a memorial to Prithviraj Chauhan, the great hero of the Rajput Chauhan dynasty. Located on the Taragarh Road in Ajmer, the memorial has a statue of the king in black stone, mounted on a horse.

title: Awesome and Must Visit .
review: Complete City is visible from this prime location . Also the Taragarh Fort is at the back side . The monument is mammoth and looks fantastic ...  Prithviraj was the last Hindu King Samarat who ruled the Delhi .

title: Good
review: The Prithviraj Smarak is a memorial to Prithviraj Chauhan. Located on the Taragarh Road in Ajmer. Complete City is visible from this prime location.

title: History
review: I saw this statue somewhere in Ajmer while travelling somewhere in the city, but because i was there for just 1 day, dont exactly remember where i saw it.

title: Historic  Place
review: If you are a indian history lover than pl. visit the Prithvi Raj Chauhan Smarak. King Prithviraj Chauhan, the great hero of the Rajput Chauhan dynasty in Ajmer.

title: a historic and patroit place
review: the prithvi raj chauhan smarak will show you the life of king prithvi due to a historical place must visit for history lovers
